attributes.action: To get the government to supply sanitary products to women and girls in poverty
attributes.additional_details:
The lack of period products often causes individuals to conform to using unsanitary products which leads to many health problems . Additionally it impacts education as girls have to miss school .it impacts the uk highly , it was found that 50% of girls said that they couldn’t afford menstrual products at some point in the past. 
This is a highly impactful topic and a real problem!!!!!
attributes.background: Supply areas of high poverty and homelessness with sanitary products as often individuals who are struggling financially have to ration their income thus meaning a simple need such as a tampon or a pad seems expensive.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar action:

Fund increased access to menstrual products to address period poverty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710759

Fund free period hygiene products via the NHS for all who need it
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704841
